# Hannibal

**Type:** Person
**Confidence:** 100%

## Summary

A military commander noted for his cruelty and effectiveness in maintaining the loyalty of his diverse army.

## Source Mentions

> Among the noteworthy actions of Hannibal is numbered this, that although he had an enormous army, composed of men of all nations and fighting in foreign countries, there never arose any dissension either among them or against the prince.
